code: import React from'react';import'../Style/PopularProduct.css';import Populars from'../API/Popular';import{useState}from'react';import CurrencyRupeeRoundedIcon from'@mui/icons-material/CurrencyRupeeRounded';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PopularProduct=()=>{const[PopularP,SetPopularP]=useState(Populars);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"top-popular-product-sec",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"wrapper-popular-sec",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{id:"title",children:"Popular Product"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"all-popular-product",children:PopularP.map((Product,Index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"popular-product-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"product-img-sec",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:Product.image,alt:"",id:"product-image"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"product-detail",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{id:"product-name",children:Product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{id:"product-des",children:Product.des}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{id:"product-price",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CurrencyRupeeRoundedIcon,{fontSize:"small"}),Product.price]})]})]});})})]})});};export default PopularProduct;
